review: I have had this for awhile and I am still enjoying it immensely. In my attempt to save money, I opted not to get cable and sign up for HuluPlus in addition to my Netflix subscription. Since I don't own a computer, I was watching all of my shows on my tablet; enter Google Chromecast. All of my Netflix movies and show, without the sore elbows (from being propped up in bed)=Priceless. The set up was very quick, and I was casting before I knew it. Though I love it, the only flaw I have encountered is that sometimes shows will say "loading" and never load. When that happens, I unplug the Chromecast from my TV and let it rest. I plug it in later and I am good to go.
author: Amazon Customer "Queen of Bookdom"
